context: Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,Pregnancy Tests,
review:
Thanks is just a small word, and there‚Äôs nothing that can express our gratitude towards Dr.SriDevi.
Doctor has been with us for our entire pregnancy journey, believe me every visit is a pleasure full one. We had two unsuccessful conceiving during last two years (when we consulted different doctors), but our confidence got boosted multi fold right from our first check up with Dr.SriDevi.
She never prescribed unnecessary medications or unnecessary tests. And Dr used to explain the importance of each medicine and test prescribed.
She always spent good amount of time with us, cleared all our doubts and misconceptions, taught us the right things. (This is something we were lacking during our past two bitter experiences with different doctors).  This developed a special bond for us with the doctor, She is like our family member now.
Doctor and Staff were always available at anytime. We had few ‚Äúfalse alarms‚Äù during and after 36 weeks of pregnancy, and had to rush to hospital on a Sunday, and few times in late hours. 
Kudos to Staff, they were super responsive on the phone call and readily available in the hospital, take LST tests and send them to doctor and guidance of doctor at those critical times were really a boon to us.
Thanks to Dr.SriDevi and Team (Anusha, Sandhya, Sireesha, Amani, Leela, Radha, Kamala, Aayamma, Hope I ve not missed any name here :) ) for all your support.
Now we have our baby, and We will miss all of you, seems like a last of college when we bid farewell to all our good friends and teachers :)
All the best to all the staff, Wish a lot more success to Dr.SriDevi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
While I was looking to consult a gynecologist, I found Sridevi mam . With no expectations I went  to Sai Neha hospital & done with some mandatory check ups.  After my 2nd visit only I feel like I am into safer hands.  I am pretty much alergytic to the medicine, here my pregnancy journy went  smooth with minimal  medicines. **** *** **** *** ****** *********** ******** * *********  Listen to our complaints clearly , prescribe suitable effective medicine.  Mam mostly preferred for Normal delivery.  Due to my delivery condition I went for c section. But, after c section also recovering early .

I feel happy  to choosen Sai Neha hospital & Sridevi mam as my doctor during my Pregnancy. 
Last week only I'm blessed with baby girl. We both are doing well. 

One more thing here pedestrian also very nice doctor. They may advise phototherapy if they want, as we are not aware of that much. But sir did observation & then only proceeding.  Which is also great thing that our baby will be in a safer side.  
And finally, Staff also very nice, all young girls very respectable, friendly & patience oriented.

Thank you Sai Neha hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Being recommended by my friend, I visited Dr. Sridevi Ragi at Sai Neha Hospital on the very first day I saw two pink lines in the home pregnancy test kit. Dr. Ragi took detailed note of my past history and took all measures to protect my pregnancy by all means. My overall pregnancy journey has been smooth. However, whenever I faced any trouble with regard to acute acidity or constipation, doctor came to my rescue. She was  reachable  via phone. I rarely came across a doctor who herself checks on patient to know her status update. I remember on days when I visited her in the morning in acute trouble, she would check my status at night. I am extremely blessed  to have Dr. Ragi as my consultant in this pregnancy journey. Though my pregnancy journey has been overall smooth, surprisingly my water broke at 4am on 35th week. My husband called Sai Neha hospital at that odd hour 4am to inform emergency. Within 5 mins, Dr. Ragi called back and has been all throughout over phone and guided me till I took admission. She was constantly there and ensured that I have safe delivery. I am extremely grateful to her the way she dealt the emergency situation and ensured my and my baby's safety. I strongly recommend her for consultation. I have earlier visited many gynaecologists who would charge Rs. 700/- for consultation but wouldn't even spare 7 minutes for you. Dr. Sridevi Ragi is a true professional. She patiently listens to you and thoroughly checks you and explains in details to you everything. Most importantly, she gives you time.  She is very approachable, sincere and responsible doctor. She has the required expertise to deal with emergency situation. I cannot thank her enough for being always there in my pregnancy journey! Thank you Doctor! I am forever grateful to you! üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr. Sri Devi ragi ma'am for my PCOD, pregnancy checkups, and delivery, we had taken good decisions. Dr. Sri Devi ragi ma'am is very friendly and used to be very calm during the visit. She used to clear our doubts very neatly. She never gave any unnecessary scans and medications. Anyone can follow her instructions and suggestions blindly without thinking twice. She gave her number and said that don't hesitate to call whenever needed. I liked that as many won't give their number to patients. And most important I used to be very happy after visiting her for checkups every time by clearing all my doubts and by listening to her advice. I appreciate her patience. Even after attending so many patients she always used to be very cool and calm and always smiling which made me feel comfortable. As we were very much satisfied with her treatment we never felt to change. Pregnancy pains triggered in the Sunday evening, and we are admitted in the hospital in the late evening, Dr. Sri Devi ragi ma'am came to the hospital and she was there all night in the hospital with me, I was blessed with baby boy at 12:30 AM, and Sri Devi ragi ma'am was there till 7 AM in the hospital and came to see me for every hour.  I can highly recommend this doctor & clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ******* **** ** * **** ************* *******  I have delivered a healthy baby girl through vaginal delivery by her support. Thank you so much Mam for your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have faced alot of complications during my pregnancy, bt sridevi mam treated and explained the issue clearly, I am very thank ful to mam dat mam responded via phone at late nights also, throughout my pregnancy mam has supported me and given me the friendly advices about diet, care and all the things. With all blessings now iam blessed with a baby boy. Mam unnecessarily didn't suggest any tests or any medicines. I strongly recommend sridevi mam for all the reasons simplicity, friendliness, understanding the issue and treating them accordingly. Firstly she is very very cool. Who are looking for gynec issues consult sridevi mam because u can find a better doctor without consulting here and there.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I have visited mam for my second pregnancy and I have started from 5 th month. Mam was very friendly and she listens to all our problem and explains very neatly, after that I was worried why I could not find her during my initial days of pregnancy and the way she has taken care during section was impressive and awesome. She will respond immediately  during emergency and also she answers our small doubts durring the pregnancy through mobile.
 
Over all great experience with Sridevi mam..the only concern is we have to go for reimbursement there is no cashless services if we go for insurance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently had my vaginal delivery at Rainbow Kondapur for insurance coverage and its first baby. I consulted doctor Sridevi from the time I conceived at Sai Neha Hospital. Doctor is very friendly and listens to all our concerns with utmost patience. She always made sure that the whole delivery process is quite normal without using lots of medicines. Even post delivery she was very supportive. Sai Neha Hospital staff is too good towards patients. Ma'am also conducted yoga sessions in the hospital which were quite helpful for normal delivery. Thanks for all the cooperation to ma'am and hospital staff throughout my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently had my second baby. I went to Sridevi Ma'am from the time I conceived till delivery. I had very good experience in the Sai Neha hospital. Doctor and staff are friendly and responsible. ** *********** ********** ** ****** All diagnostic tests are also available in the hospital itself. In the pandemic time, I think Sai Neha Hospital is best in the locality considering the facilities and treatment provided. However, I went to Rainbow Kondapur for my delivery to avail insurance facilities. Sridevi Ma'am did my delivery and took care post delivery as well. After having experience at Rainbow hospital, I realised Sai Neha hospital would have been a better hospital for delivery considering the personal care and facilities provided. Thank you, Sridevi Ma'am and your staff for treating me and ensuring that I had a safe pregnancy and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I started consulting Sridevi Ragi mam from my 3rd trimester after recommendation from a family friend. It turned out to be satisfactory as mam showed a lot of patience in listening to me and gave us good guidance. She encourages one to have normal delivery unless there is any other medical condition or other factors. I had an emergency C-section and delivered a healthy baby boy. Hospital staff were available round the clock for any support needed. Even after discharge mam and hospital staff were very supportive when we reached out to them on phone for any queries. Highly recommend Dr.Sridevi Ragi mam. Can't thank Mam and her staff enough for all their support throughout.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I did my both delivery with dr. Sridevi now i feel like she's our family doctor üòä. We're happy that mam made it both normal as we were concerned about  c-section. In my 1st, after few hours of labour i wanted to go for epidural but mam encourage me not to go for it as i was doing fine till then n could make it till end. Because of that in my 2nd also i didn't opt it. What i liked most is mam's patience. She listens very well nd never give answers hurriedly which i experienced with other doctors who finishes consultation as soon as possible to attain next patient. Apart from pregnancy, we visited mam for my mother in-laws UTI, there also she did her job well with less medication nd quick result.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am very pleased with my experience¬†with Dr. Sridevi Ragi  at Sai Neha Hospital. I can be a hard critic of Doctors/hospitals but this time was a world away from previous experiences elsewhere. It was good to be treated with professionalism and care. When I say the doctor made me feel that I was in safe hands and even made my wife/me smile when we left, then you can believe She is the best. I am truly grateful to Dr. Sridevi Ragi since she rescued us on the 7th month of pregnancy after the unfortunate death of Dr. Satya Ramya.Big corporates usually scare me with all thehype which goes around there. In this case I still remember our first visit where I just took an online appointment & I was sent in within 5minutes of my arrival at the clinic. She took a detailed history & patiently looked at my wife's previous health records. She gave very genuine advice with minimal investigations & to followup with them. She was very precise in what signs we had to watchout for when my wife was on treatment. I came out with a deep sense of satisfaction & relief that we found the right place. I have always been able to talk to the doctor and get my problems resolved 24√ó7. Coming here is like dealing with trusted family. Would not consider changing doctors

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: One of my better experience with Dr Sridevi Ragi Madam, *** ** *** **** ****** **** *********** ** ** ****. Very Understanding, kind & real. I would recommend her to anyone honestly.  One visit to ma'am and all our worries are put to rest. She's a very straight forward person, The staff too are very friendly and available anytime.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr.SriDevi Mam is kind nd friendly person, she explained everything to me in a very clear manner.she is lovely to speak with at every appointment, nd all of the staff was great nd very supportive.
I am also glad nd I choose Sai Neha hospital nd I would highly recommend to everyone

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,
review: My experience with Sridevi mam is beyond my expectation. She was always available in case of emergency. The way she explains and communicates is very friendly and she explains each and every doubt very patiently. I had to get admitted in the hospital on an emergency basis for delivery. Sridevi mam and hospital staff were so co-operative during my delivery. Overall, my experience with Sridevi mam is very satisfactory and i highly recomend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Scan,
review: Thanks Sridevi Ma'am and Hospital staff for taking care of our child birth and being there from very beginning of the process and ensuring seamless experience throughout. We also regularly visit her for consultation related to Thyroid issues as well. I would definitely recommend her over for all the pregnancy care any day.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: * **** *** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** ***** Had very good experience with her. Very patient and friendly in answering all the queries and was very quick in responding to my call during emergency and giving immediate treatment to deliver my warrior baby. Highly highly recommend her!!

She has done delivery of our first child at rainbow hospital and now after 2.5 yrs we are going back to same doctor as she is so friendly and good that tou don‚Äôt need to worry much. *** ** **** ***** ****** ********* ** *** **** *** **** *** **** ************

I am really blessed to have Dr.Sridevi Ragi as our doctor. *** ** **** ************* *** handled our case very well. She has lot of patience and will always advise the best. *** **** ******** ** *** **** ***** ** ******* **** Nurses are also very helpful here. You can get most of the tests done here. I am blessed now with a daughter üòáüòä and highly recommend Sridevi Ragi mam and Sai Neha hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
There is a magic in Dr.Sridevi, with help of her words, medicine and from her hand we happily became parents. We were blessed with a baby boy and baby girl recently from her hands. 

Pros: respects your words, emotions
Never recomend unnecessary tests/ other things.
Hospital is having a friendly staff and everyone make us feel comfortable.

Finally trust our doctor and follow her suggestions, her magic will work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We were in search of a good maternity clinic for our 2nd baby, within insurance coverage limit moreover doctor who prefers Normal than a C-section, near to Hitech City Kondapur, Hyderabad

For all our criteria, i feel this is best.
Gyanac doctor, Paediatrician, Clinic staff everyone were very supportive.

Dr Sridevi was available for all the time during the birth process, very cooperative with the mother

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went for pregnancy planning and with Sridevi mam support and guidance, was able to conceive in short period of time. She is very professional and explains everything in detail. Also during pregnancy checkup she gives all the necessary information and advise in a friendly way, she is a very positive influence for us, Thank you Madam !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
First time I visited SaiNeha hospital for Pregnancy check up, I was really impressed with the hospital staff. 
Dr. SRIDEVI RAGI was very helpful throughout my pregnancy period. She explained me things very patiently.  

Also with her contacts, Dr. Sridevi was able to get help when I was pregnant and covid positive.

I recommend Sai Neha for Gynic consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a pleasant experience from Dr.Sridevi with her treatment and the professional/ transparent vision. She has been very clear and friendly in treating the patient and provided a suitable medication based on the condition from day one. Let‚Äôs not forget the efforts of staff. Like Doctor, like staff. Overall, it was a very happy experience. Thank you!

review:
Hi,

I have visited this hospital for my wife pregnancy. From third month onwards we followed the suggestions said by Dr. Sridevi Madam.  Doctor cleared all the queries raised by us in every months checkup. With doctor cooperation and suggestion we blessed with a baby girl through Normal delivery.

Thanks you soo much for everything mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I have shared an adverse review earlier... after callback from the doctor. I repented the same and her version seemed genuine and she also accepted where it all went wrong. i am continuing with her after her genuine followup. Hope it goes all well till delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

I had normal delivery at rainbow üåà  hospital. she was through out the process with me. I highly recommend  this doctor for pregnancy support.

I highly recommend Dr Sreedevi madam for pregnancy related care!

review: Doctor has lots of patience, she considers everything in detail and suggests the best. I felt comfortable in consulting her and strongly recommends her to my friends. In Corona times, when I was unable to meet her in person, she used to respond promptly on whatsapp/call.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

She has lot of patience and explains everything very clearly and guides well and responds to all the queries we ask. I underwent elective cesarean delivery which was done by mam and everything went well on time. Now I m blessed with a baby girl. Thank you for the support and care mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is very friendly and  committed towards her profession. She listen carefully to our  health issues and explain us in detail about the treatment.

I recommend to visit Sri Devi garu. Moreover  Sai Neha Hospital is very near to me(Botanical Garden Road, Kondapur) which give services at par with the best. 

Thank you Sridevi Garu for your treatment.

review: Dr Sri Devi is very friendly and deals with patience about the issues. Explanation and caring was very good. I will definitely suggest Dr Sri Devi to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Would highly recommend Dr. Sridevi Ragi. I had a great experience with her. We tried many doctors but didn't get satisfaction of love and care that we got from mam. She is very calm and listens problems with patience . I had a smooth journey throughout pregnancy but at last moment some complications came which she handled very well . She is just like a god for us. She makes patient comfortable which we need most from a doctor. Dr. Sridevi Ragi is blindly trustable doctor anyone can go for her without any second thought.
